article_title: Why You Can't Make A Smart Choice Among Dozens Of Health Insurance Plans

article_metadata.author: John C. Goodman

og.description: The Obama administration calls the health insurance exchanges “markets.” But they are unlike any market you have ever encountered. Ideally, people should comparison shop – considering the differences in premiums, subsidies, and networks of the different plans. There’s only one problem. Intelligent comparison shopping is virtually impossible. Think about what you [...]
